name: Rocket Boy
description:
ROCKET BOY

Rocket Boy is a short racing game, in an endless travel around the moon. The challenge is to be able to get enough fuel for the rocket without crashing against asteroids. As the time passes and the rocket gets refueled, the game will become increasingly faster and more difficult. Just move the mouse up/down to avoid asteroids and pick the fuel capsules. How long can you keep the good speed?
